item.title: Where would I put this?
item.dc:creator: @John459 John459
item.description:
@John459 wrote:

First of all this is wrong:

[code]public int[] CRYSTAL_CHEST = {“Id’s here…”};

public int crystalChestPrize()
{
return CRYSTAL_CHEST[(int) (Math.random() * CRYSTAL_CHEST.length)];
}[/code]

It should be:

[code]public static int CrystalChestPrize[] = {ids here};

public static int randomCrystalChestPrize()
{
	return CrystalChestPrize[(int)(Math.random()*CrystalChestPrize.length)];
}[/code]

That would go in item2.java

The other part is wrong too. It should be

addItem(Item2.randomCrystalChestPrize(), 1);

Instead of

addItem(crystalChestPrize(), 1);

Read full topic

item.title: Where would I put this?

item.description:
@forest419 wrote:

public int[] CRYSTAL_CHEST = {“Id’s here…”};

public int crystalChestPrize() 
{
	return CRYSTAL_CHEST[(int) (Math.random() * CRYSTAL_CHEST.length)];
}

 if (UsedOnObjectID == #### && ItemID == ####)
 {
        addItem(crystalChestPrize(), 1);
	deleteItem(####, 1);
	sendMessage("You gain a random prize from the chest!");
 }

^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^
I think I know where 2nd one goes but not first. Thanks (:
